Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Gen AI is a great tool to learn content sometimes in the lectures or tutorials hard to get personalized help but ai you can tailor to teach you the niche things that you dont know. However teachers are much more reliable and have the source of the information.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Teachers for a lot of tests and exams dont provide any feedback however when doing an assignement you can ask the GenAI to go through rubric and try provide insight.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: Teacher when they do provide feedback it is reliable, logical and very sound but it is not common enough that teachers do this. Gen AI is very easily accessible and easy to use that can give good direction.
